entry.title: App, Lover, Muse
entry.quote: Inside a 47-year-old Minnesota man's three-year relationship with an AI chatbot.

entry.title: Hacker leaks millions more 23andMe user records on cybercrime forum
entry.quote: The same hacker who leaked a trove of user data stolen from the genetic testing company 23andMe two weeks ago has now leaked millions of new user records.

entry.title: Wealth Shown to a Pixel Scale
entry.quote: Compelling view of the wealth gap

entry.title: The 1924 Mikiphone: The World’s First Pocket Record Player
entry.quote: Back in the 1920s, long before modern gadgets took over our daily lives, a nifty little invention brought music to people’s pockets.

entry.title: The 10 Year Anniversary of the HealthCare.gov Rescue
entry.quote: It was getting late. Could we throw a Hail Mary? Walk out of that building leaving behind something of tangible value, something promising they could build on?
